member.name: DML_DEPTH_SPACE_ORDER
member.summary: Defines constants controlling the transform applied in the DirectML operators and DML_OPERATOR_SPACE_TO_DEPTH1. These are used within the and structures.

summary.para: Causes tensors used in and to be interpreted with the following layouts, where dimensions in parenthesis are flattened together.

item.description: Depth version: [Batch, (BlockHeight, BlockWidth, Channels), Height, Width]

summary.para: Causes tensors used in and to be interpreted with the following layouts, where dimensions in parenthesis are flattened together.

item.description: Depth version: [Batch, (Channels, BlockHeight, BlockWidth), Height, Width]
